import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Oval from './Oval' export default function TechSkills() { const [isDesktop, setDesktop] = useState(window.innerWidth > 1050); const updateMedia = () => { setDesktop(window.innerWidth > 1050); }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("resize", updateMedia); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", updateMedia); }); if (isDesktop) { return (
) } else { return (
) } }
